# Prompt 01: Initial Portal Setup

## User Request

Help me build a customer portal where I can embed Power BI reports with authentication. Users should be able to log in and view reports assigned to them.

## Expected Outcome

- Basic Express server with static file serving
- Simple HTML frontend with login page
- Database with users table
- JWT authentication
- Power BI embed integration
- Basic routing between pages

## Key Technologies

- Node.js + Express
- Vanilla JavaScript frontend
- sql.js for database
- JWT for authentication
- Power BI JavaScript SDK
